S.FORM: Evo Morales 10 bulad 26 demiad, Evo Morales, u misingkiway. 1959 a mihca nalecuhan u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung nu Bolivia ayza sa ci Evo Morales, micakat a demiad sa i 2006 a mihca 1 bulad 22 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
